title: Chemist

properties.name: description
properties.value: The chemist is in his house in Rimmington. He explains how to make lamp oil in the lamp oil still for oil lamps, oil lanterns, and bullseye lanterns. He gives sieves for making imp repellent.

Chemist
Released23 October 2002 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceHuman

• Regicide
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineSmells very chemically...
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID1146

The chemist is in his house in Rimmington. He explains how to make lamp oil in the lamp oil still for oil lamps, oil lanterns, and bullseye lanterns. He gives sieves for making imp repellent.

During the Biohazard quest, he gives the player touch paper for Guidor.

During Regicide, the player must ask for permission to use the distiller to make a barrel of naphtha.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • The chemist is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: I would make a chemistry joke, but I'm afraid I wouldn't get a reaction.

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
